---
title: "Help us select our next project(s)!"
date: 2022-09-16
---

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Project proposal submissions to the PSA’s <a href="https://psysciacc.org/2022/07/28/special-call-for-studies-studying-generalizability-with-global-samples-deadline-extended/">special call for studies</a> that have passed the initial phase of study selection are now available for network evaluations. PSA members can read and provide feedback on the proposals in a <a href="https://canvas.psysciacc.org/courses/1/quizzes/89">survey on the Canvas membership site</a>. Specifically, you will be asked to rate the submission as a potential PSA project and indicate your interest in contribution to the project if selected. Providing feedback is completely optional, but much appreciated, and will not take much of your time. The deadline to submit evaluations is September 30th. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->
